Game.Name: Advance GT2 (Japan) (En)
Game.plot: Choose from more than 90 authentic cars with upgradable parts from 10 top car manufacturers. Unlock cars with different acceleration, top speeds, and handling in order to master the 46 tracks.Cheat: Unlock CodeAt starting screen press these to unlock:Cheat: Unlock Expert ModeTo unlock expert mode, beat and achieve a gold medal on every race in every class on normal mode. Including licence trials. Cheat: Unlock Expert ModeOn the Mode Select Screen, choose the Drift-Combo option and get 10 consecutive drifts in a row. An easy way to do this is to drift multiple times, it doesnt matter if the drifts are nice looking and stay on the track. When your drifts are counted at the end, It will tell you that you unlocked a Soarer, a Lexus SC430.
